name: Ant Fall
description:
Ant Fall

"Ant Fall" is a tiny game where a tiny ant uses its tiny leaf-parachute to jump on tiny leaves trying to stay in flight (alive) as farther as possible.

Objective:

Control the ant moving horizontally and opening the leaf-parachute to land on the leaves passing on the screen. Each leaf works as a trampoline and boosts the ant up

Keep on air the farthest you can!

Controls:

Arrow Keys: move horizontally

Space Bar (hold): open leaf-parachute

Made for submission on GBJAM 5.
